TopicTitle: What do you think about this FIAT 500X advertisement :-)

Articles.Content:
my sister has a fiat 500 and its a cute little car with a stunning interior

im not sure what the point is to upgrade it to the average looking suv car...

btw the viagra reference is pretty stupid...
That is one tough and weirdly aerodynamic pill despite its shape.

> 
> my sister has a fiat 500 and its a cute little car with a stunning interior
> im not sure what the point is to upgrade it to the average looking suv car...
> 
> btw the viagra reference is pretty stupid...

In Poland during communism and early very popular was this car
